meanings.sent1: The old attic was cobwebbed, with dusty strands hanging from the ceiling.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house looked cobwebbed and neglected.
meanings.sent3: The Halloween decorations made the house look cobwebbed and spooky.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt cobwebbed with confusion after a long day of studying.
meanings.sent5: The neglected garden shed was cobwebbed, like a forgotten corner of the world.

meanings.sent1: The basement was cobwebbed, with spiders scurrying in the corners.
meanings.sent2: The old shed was cobwebbed and musty from years of disuse.
meanings.sent3: The dusty bookshelf was cobwebbed, hiding forgotten treasures.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were cobwebbed with memories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned mansion was cobwebbed, a relic of a bygone era.

meanings.sent1: She watched as the spiders cobwebbed the corners of the room.
meanings.sent2: The neglected room was cobwebbed by spiders seeking shelter.
meanings.sent3: He decided to cobweb the old chair as a Halloween decoration.
